SQL_STMT_U.val: select cardcode,cardname,ObjType,DocEntry,max(DocNum) DocNum,sum(DocTotal) Total,min(DocDate) DocDate,max(DocDueDate) DueDate from ( select cardcode,cardname,ObjType,DocEntry,DocNum,DocDate,DocStatus,DocTotal-RoundDif DocTotal,DocDueDate from oinv where Canceled='N' union all select cardcode,cardname,ObjType,DocEntry,DocNum,DocDate,DocStatus,DocTotal*-1 ,DocDueDate from orin where Canceled='N' union all SELECT h.CardCode,cardname,d.InvType,d.DocEntry,0,h.DocDate,h.[Status],d.SumApplied*-1,DocDuedate FROM RCT2 d, ORCT h where h.DocEntry=d.DocNum and h.Canceled='N' and (d.InvType=203 and d.DocEntry not in( select BaseAbs from inv9 union all select BaseAbs from rin9 ) or d.InvType<>203) )x where DocDate<=':1' and cardname like '%:2%' group by cardcode,cardname,ObjType,DocEntry having sum(DocTotal)<>0 UNION ALL select cardcode,cardname,'TOTAL' OBJTYPE,NULL,NULL,sum(DocTotal) Total,NULL,NULL from ( select cardcode,cardname,ObjType,DocEntry,DocNum,DocDate,DocStatus,DocTotal-RoundDif DocTotal,DocDueDate from oinv where Canceled='N' union all select cardcode,cardname,ObjType,DocEntry,DocNum,DocDate,DocStatus,DocTotal*-1 ,DocDueDate from orin where Canceled='N' union all SELECT h.CardCode,cardname,d.InvType,d.DocEntry,0,h.DocDate,h.[Status],d.SumApplied*-1,DocDuedate FROM RCT2 d, ORCT h where h.DocEntry=d.DocNum and h.Canceled='N' and (d.InvType=203 and d.DocEntry not in( select BaseAbs from inv9 union all select BaseAbs from rin9 ) or d.InvType<>203) )x where DocDate<=':1' and cardname like '%:2%' group by cardcode,cardname having sum(DocTotal)<>0 order by CardCode,objtype,DocEntry

select sum(DocTotal) Total from ( select cardname,DocEntry,DocTotal-RoundDif DocTotal from oinv where DocDate<=':1' and cardname like '%:2%' and Canceled='N' union all select cardname,DocEntry,DocTotal*-1 from orin where DocDate<=':1' and cardname like '%:2%' and Canceled='N' union all SELECT cardname,d.DocEntry,d.SumApplied*-1 FROM RCT2 d, ORCT h where h.DocEntry=d.DocNum and h.Canceled='N' and (d.InvType=203 and d.DocEntry not in( select BaseAbs from inv9 union all select BaseAbs from rin9 ) or d.InvType<>203) and DocDate<=':1' and cardname like '%:2%' )x
